title: Should I write my guy friend a letter telling him how I feel? - Quora

response.answer_text: No. The only time I told someone (who I didn't have a love relationship)how I felt towards him by Facebook message and I regret it. Those things should be told face to face or better don't tell him. I know it's difficult and you’re afraid of rejection, I was like you so I wait and wait until he moved from my home city and I coul tell him only by text. Don't make this mistake, ask him to meet. Tell him how do you feel and if he doesn't feel the same, well, you'll move on one day. At least after doing it you'll know how brave you are ;-)

And what are you planning on doing if he does not feel the same way? Not dissing you here sister, but let us face facts. You and I do not handle rejection really well. Guys are born and bred for it. You and me, not so much. So, what are your plans if he does no react EXACTLY as your fantasy scenario says he will? The letter can change your friendship and end it pretty quickly. Is that what you want? Finally, if you are friends then why the letter? Can't you direct the conversation toward moving to the next level? Can’t you talk to the boy you plan on making your boyfriend? If not, then maybe this is not such a good idea in the first place. If you can’t talk to him how can you have a more-than-friend relationship with him? Just saying.

I live my life a very specific way. I have told others that I love them and dealt with the rejection of being in a relationship waiting to hear it said back to me (twice) and I still don’t regret saying how I feel. You win some and you lose some but you never know how your words will change someone’s life. Tell your friend how you feel. It could be amazing or terrible but you’ll never know if you don’t do it. If you live your life with fear as an influencer, life will be very limited to you.

Of course, if you want; but why a letter instead of just telling him? If you’re spending time together, you could have a sincere conversation with him. If you feel you can express yourself better by writing a letter, by all means, do so. Thanks for the A2A
Letters are definitely a great way to thoroughly get your feelings across. How To Write A Friendly Letter: 3 Min QUICK GUIDE
